captions.text:
OLDER ROSE (OFFSCREEN): Titanic,
it was called--

-I've got everything I need
right here with me.

I figure life's a gift, and I
don't intend on wasting it.

You never know what
hand you're going

You learn to take life
as it comes at you.

-When the ship docks, I'm
getting off with you.

[MUSIC - CELINE DION, "MY
HEART WILL GO ON"]
-Do not let go of my hand.

matrixfan127, its not that we don't care about the real people who died at 
all. Jack Dawson doesn't represent Leonardo DiCaprio, he represents a third 
class man who died on the Titanic. All of the extras in the movie represent 
the real innocent people who lost their lives that fateful night/morning. 
Titanic wouldn't be sad if it wasn't based off of a true event, which 
simply means tha twe are grieving for those real people who died, not the 
actors who simply swimming in the water.﻿
